CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL(Type__c,"Renewal"), (Livongo_for_Diabetes_PwDs__c * Livongo_for_Diabetes_PPPM__c * Livongo_for_Diabetes_Program_Term__c ) + (Livongo_for_Hypertension_PwHs__c * Livongo_for_Hypertension_PPPM__c * Livongo_for_Hypertension_Program_Term__c ) + ( Livongo_for_Weight_Management_DP_PwOs__c * Livongo_for_Weight_Management_DP_PPPM__c * Livongo_for_WM_DP_Program_Term__c ), 0)
CustomField.label: Renewal Total Contract Value
